abstract: Comcast is buying Daily Candy, the publisher of shopping and culture e-mail newsletters and Web sites, for about $125 million, people briefed on the matter told DealBook.
lead_paragraph: Comcast is buying Daily Candy, the publisher of shopping and culture e-mail newsletters and Web sites, for about $125 million, people briefed on the matter told DealBook.

headline.main: Comcast to Buy Daily Candy for $125 Million
